articles.title: Messi, Argentina play Poland for survival at World Cup
articles.description: DOHA, Qatar (AP) — Lionel Messi has already come to Argentina’s rescue at the World Cup . He might just have to do it all over again. Another emotionally charged evening awaits Messi and the soccer-mad south American nation that worships him when Argentina meets Poland on Wednesday for a match with so much on the line.
articles.content:
Argentina's Lionel Messi celebrates after scoring his side's opening goal during the World Cup group C soccer match between Argentina and Mexico, at the Lusail Stadium in Lusail, Qatar, Saturday, Nov. 26, 2022. (AP Photo/Ariel Schalit)
